mapper.select: SELECT ITEM_CODE , ID , ITEM_NAME , ITEM_PRICE , TOTAL_PRICE , ATTACHED_IMG_NAME , CART_DATE , CART_CODE , ITEM_CNT FROM CART_VIEW WHERE ID = #{id}

SELECT C.ITEM_CODE , ID , C.ITEM_NAME , C.ITEM_PRICE , TOTAL_PRICE , ATTACHED_IMG_NAME , CART_DATE , CART_CODE , C.ITEM_CNT , (SELECT ITEM_STOCK FROM ITEM I WHERE I.ITEM_CODE = #{itemCode}) AS ITEM_STOCK FROM CART_VIEW C WHERE ID = #{id} AND C.ITEM_CODE = #{itemCode}
SELECT SUM(TOTAL_PRICE) AS ALL_TOTAL_PRICE FROM CART_VIEW WHERE ID = #{id}
SELECT ITEM_CODE , ID , ITEM_NAME , ITEM_PRICE , TOTAL_PRICE , ATTACHED_IMG_NAME , CART_DATE , CART_CODE , ITEM_CNT FROM CART_VIEW WHERE ID = #{id} AND ITEM_CODE = #{itemCode}

SELECT BUY_CODE , ITEM_CODE , ID , TOTAL_PRICE , TO_CHAR(BUY_DATE, 'YY-MM-DD HH24-MI') AS BUY_DATE , BUY_CNT , BUY_STATUS , PAYMENT_PLAN , DELIVERY_NAME , DELIVERY_TELL , DELIVERY_EMAIL , DELIVERY_MSG , POST_CODE , ROAD_ADDR , DETAIL_ADDR FROM BUY_INFO WHERE ID = #{id} AND ORDER_CODE = #{orderCode} ORDER BY ROWNUM

SELECT BUY_CODE , ATTACHED_IMG_NAME , ITEM_CODE , ITEM_NAME , TOTAL_PRICE , TO_CHAR(BUY_DATE, 'YY-MM-DD HH24-MI') AS BUY_DATE , (TOTAL_PRICE / BUY_CNT) AS ITEM_PRICE , BUY_CNT , BUY_STATUS , PAYMENT_PLAN , DELIVERY_NAME , DELIVERY_TELL , DELIVERY_EMAIL , DELIVERY_MSG , POST_CODE , ROAD_ADDR , DETAIL_ADDR FROM BUY_INFO WHERE ORDER_CODE = #{orderCode} ORDER BY ROWNUM

SELECT ORDER_CODE , BUY_DATE , BUY_STATUS , TOTAL_PRICE , PAYMENT_PLAN , ATTACHED_IMG_NAME , ITEM_CODE , (SELECT ITEM_NAME FROM ITEM I WHERE I.ITEM_CODE = BI.ITEM_CODE) AS ITEM_NAME , BUY_CNT , BUY_STATUS , DELIVERY_NAME , POST_CODE , ROAD_ADDR , DETAIL_ADDR , DELIVERY_TELL , DELIVERY_MSG , DELIVERY_EMAIL , (SELECT SUM(TOTAL_PRICE) FROM BUY_INFO WHERE ORDER_CODE = #{orderCode} ) AS ALL_TOTAL_PRICE FROM BUY_INFO BI WHERE ORDER_CODE = #{orderCode}
